thread.title: Hilary Duff Accessorized Her Cape With Ugg Boots
thread.title_full: Hilary Duff Accessorized Her Cape With Ugg Boots -- The Cut

author: Stephanie Eckardt
title: Hilary Duff Accessorized Her Cape With Ugg Boots
text:
Hilary Duff. Photo: Felipe Ramales / Splash News
Fall is officially here, which means that the Rihannas among us are getting ready for Rocktober , and the Brooklyn moms are rolling out their trendily impractical capes . Yesterday, one such resident and noted enthusiast of the borough was spotted heralding in the new season. Stepping out to film her TV series, Younger, Hilary Duff wore a cape with buckles and a pair of cuffed shearling Uggs, both in the autumn-appropriate hue of butternut squash.
